channel.title: Error connecting to server
channel.description:
Now this is a bit of an odd problem.
I'm running my server on one of my friends computers, I can connect to it just fine using my NO-IP address and so can the host computer using 127.0.0.1. The only problem is, my friend wants to run the server on his new laptop, I've set up Enviro' Var's, but it won't connect on the NO-IP nor 127.0.0.1. This laptop is on the same IP as the host. 0.0.0.0 does not work either.
I'm a bit confused.

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

Now this is a bit of an odd problem.

I’m running my server on one of my friends computers, I can connect to it just fine using my NO-IP address and so can the host computer using 127.0.0.1. The only problem is, my friend wants to run the server on his new laptop, I’ve set up Enviro’ Var’s, but it won’t connect on the NO-IP nor 127.0.0.1. This laptop is on the same IP as the host. 0.0.0.0 does not work either.

I’m a bit confused.

Read full topic
